title: Spatiotemporal Graph Neural Networks for Probabilistic Postprocessing of Wind Speed Forecasts
description: A Modified Temporal Graph MLP-Mixer that achieves significant computational speedup over traditional graph-based methods by using a dual-branch architecture with factorized MLP mixing. It efficiently captures both local dynamics and global weather patterns while maintaining performance in probabilistic wind speed postprocessing.

title: Datacenter Simulator
description: A discrete event datacenter simulation (priority queues) with deterministic, reproducible testing. Modeling realistic network physics with leaf-spine topology, congestion-aware routing, partitions, and latency calculation. Extended into a protocol testing suite used to validate consensus algorithms (Paxos, Raft) and replication protocols under controlled fault injection.
